trans-unit.source: An element that allows you to host a Windows Forms control on a WPF page.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que permite hospedar um controle do Windows Forms em uma página da WPF.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control within your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element or page.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento para colocar um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controle dentro de sua [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento ou da página.

trans-unit.source: To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control.
trans-unit.target: Para hospedar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento em um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] de controle ou formulário, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> controle.

trans-unit.source: WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: WindowsFormsIntegration é instalado com o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies.

trans-unit.source: The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.
trans-unit.target: O local padrão para o assembly é %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.

trans-unit.source: To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para hospedar um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controlar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, você deve atribuir o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] o controle para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.PropertyMap%2A> property to assign custom mappings between a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.PropertyMap%2A> propriedade para atribuir mapeamentos personalizados entre um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento e seu hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Object Element Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de elemento Object do XAML

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element to host a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento host um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox?displayProperty=nameWithType> controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a Windows Forms Control in WPF by Using XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [passo a passo: hospedando um controle de formulários do Windows no WPF pelo XAML usando](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: para confiança total para todos os chamadores superior na pilha de chamadas.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: A área final no pai que esse elemento deve usar para organizar a si próprio e seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, positions child elements and determines a size for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />-derived class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, posiciona os elementos filho e determina um tamanho para uma classe derivada de <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The actual size used.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real usado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's background as an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a tela de fundo do controle hospedado como uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> set to the background color.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> definido como a cor de plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.BackgroundProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, essa propriedade é mapeada para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background%2A> property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o mapeamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background%2A> propriedade, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *Brush*
trans-unit.target: *Pincel*

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> para obter a sintaxe de atributo XAML.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Background" />.

trans-unit.source: The parent window's handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: Identificador da janela pai (HWND).

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> to build the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a implementação da classe base de <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> para criar o controle [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The window handle for this object.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de janela para este objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child control hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o controle filho hospedado pelo elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: O controle [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Only one child control can be hosted, but <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> can have any number of children.
trans-unit.target: Controle de apenas um filho pode ser hospedado, mas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> pode ter qualquer número de filhos.

trans-unit.source: The child control cannot be a top-level form.
trans-unit.target: O controle filho não pode ser um formulário de nível superior.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> está definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: `<` *object* `>`
trans-unit.target: `<` *objeto* `>`

trans-unit.source: `<` *hostedControl* `.../>`
trans-unit.target: `<` *hostedControl* `.../>`

trans-unit.source: `</` *object* `>`
trans-unit.target: `</` *objeto* `>`

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *object*
trans-unit.target: *object*

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element (or a possible subclass).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento (ou uma subclasse possíveis).

trans-unit.source: *hostedControl*
trans-unit.target: *hostedControl*

trans-unit.source: An element that specifies the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que especifica o hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controle.

trans-unit.source: Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Especificando o controle personalizado na marcação normalmente requer um mapeamento de xmlns, consulte [Namespaces XAML e o mapeamento de Namespace para WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> property to add the hosted control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> propriedade para adicionar o controle hospedado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting an ActiveX Control in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [passo a passo: hospedando um controle ActiveX no WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md).

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a top-level form as the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para atribuir um formulário de nível superior como o controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" /> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" /> é definida.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: A window handle.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de janela.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro não é usado.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> to delete the window containing this object.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.DestroyWindowCore(System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef)" /> para excluir a janela que contém este objeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Dispose%2A> method disposes the base <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Dispose%2A> método descarta a base de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> controle.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Habilita o funcionamento correto de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> quando ele é aberto sem modo específico em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> method to forward all keyboard messages when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> método para encaminhar todas as mensagens do teclado quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> é aberto em modo sem restrição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.EnableWindowsFormsInterop%2A> método instalará um filtro de mensagem que é necessário para formulários sem janela restrita funcionar corretamente quando aberto pelo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: You need to call this method only once for a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> instance.
trans-unit.target: Você precisa chamar este método apenas uma vez para um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> instância.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: para confiança total para todos os chamadores superior na pilha de chamadas.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font family.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a família de fontes do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The font family used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: A família da fonte usada no controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Essa configuração de propriedade afeta apenas os controles cujo modelo usa a propriedade como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: It has no effect on other controls.
trans-unit.target: Ele não tem nenhum efeito em outros controles.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamilyProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, essa propriedade é mapeada para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *fontFamily*
trans-unit.target: *fontFamily*

trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> para obter a sintaxe de atributo XAML.

trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>

trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontFamily" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho da fonte do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The font size used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da fonte usado no controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSizeProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSizeProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, essa propriedade é mapeada para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than 0.0, but smaller than <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: Representação de cadeia de caracteres um <xref:System.Double> valor igual ou maior que 0.0, mas menor do que <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Isso é interpretado como um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] medida.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Cadeias de caracteres não precisam explicitamente incluir pontos decimais.

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of 1 is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um valor de 1 é aceitável.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSize" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontSize" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da fonte do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The font style used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: O estilo da fonte usado no controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontStyleProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontStyleProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, essa propriedade é mapeada para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *fontStyle*
trans-unit.target: *fontStyle*

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.FontStyle> for XAML Attribute syntax.

trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's font weight.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o peso da fonte do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The font weight used in the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: A espessura da fonte usada no controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontWeightProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontWeightProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, essa propriedade é mapeada para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.FontWeight" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> used to set the foreground color for the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> usado para definir a cor de primeiro plano para o controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ForegroundProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ForegroundProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is mapped to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, essa propriedade é mapeada para atualizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: For more information on mapping the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground%2A> property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o mapeamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Foreground%2A> propriedade, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a layout error, such as a skew or rotation that <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> does not support, is encountered.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um erro de layout, como uma distorção ou rotação incompatível com <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />, é encontrado.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: The available size for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho disponível do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation of <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> to measure the size of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a implementação da classe base de <see cref="M:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> para medir o tamanho de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> e retornar os tamanhos corretos para o mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho desejado do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Size constraints in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout are hard constraints.
trans-unit.target: Restrições de tamanho [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout são restrições de disco rígidas.

trans-unit.source: If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region.
trans-unit.target: Se as restrições são excedidas, o host deve recorte o conteúdo dentro da região hospedada.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.
trans-unit.target: A implementação desse método impõe esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> para o elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowsFormsHostAutomationPeer" /> para o elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Arguments that identify the property that changed as well as providing that property's old and new values.
trans-unit.target: Argumentos que identifiquem a propriedade que foi alterada, bem como fornecem os valores antigo e novo da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Forces the translation of a mapped property.
trans-unit.target: Força a conversão de uma propriedade mapeada.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.OnPropertyChanged%2A> method may be necessary when a property of an ancestor element has changed, but the local value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element has not changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.OnPropertyChanged%2A> método pode ser necessário quando uma propriedade de um elemento ancestral é alterado, mas o valor local do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento não foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the desired padding within the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tamanho do preenchimento desejado no controle [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> structure representing the padding pf the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> estrutura que representa o preenchimento pf hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controle.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *Thickness*
trans-unit.target: *Espessura*

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> for XAML Attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> para obter a sintaxe de atributo XAML.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> element affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o mapa de propriedade que determina como configurar as propriedades no elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> afeta o controle de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> that maps <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> properties to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> que mapeia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost" /> propriedades às propriedades hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controle.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: As tecnologias [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] têm dois modelos de propriedade semelhantes, mas diferentes.

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *Mapeamento de propriedade* dá suporte à interoperação entre as duas arquiteturas.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como adicionar um mapeamento para o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FlowDirection%2A> propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> controle.

trans-unit.source: The new scale factor.
trans-unit.target: O novo fator de escala.

trans-unit.source: Scales the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control, and tracks the scale factor.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona o controle [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] hospedado e acompanha o fator de escala.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> que representa o fator de escala aplicado ao controle [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls do not support scaling in the same way as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controles não têm suporte para o dimensionamento da mesma maneira como [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elementos.

trans-unit.source: For example, scaling a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, dimensionar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controle de um fator de 1 para um fator de 0,5 e de volta para um fator de 1 em geral, não, recuperar o tamanho original do controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Considerações sobre Layout para o elemento WindowsFormsHost](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md).

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ScaleChild%2A> method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.ScaleChild%2A> método para fornecer o comportamento de dimensionamento personalizado hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winforms](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winforms-md.md)] controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice de tabulação do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.
trans-unit.target: O índice do guia de foco e navegação de guia.

trans-unit.source: This dependency property is identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade de dependência é identificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndexProperty> campo.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para alterar a ordem de tabulação navegação entre os controles em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index.
trans-unit.target: Um controle com um índice de tabulação inferior terá o foco antes de um controle com um índice maior.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.TabIndex" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" /> that specifies the focus behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest" /> que especifica o comportamento de foco.

trans-unit.source: Forwards focus from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] to the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Encaminha o foco de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] para o controle [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] hospedado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a control was activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se um controle tiver sido ativado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element receives a TAB command from the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> method, the first eligible control in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento recebe um comando de guia do <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> método, o primeiro qualificados controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child%2A> recebe o foco.

trans-unit.source: The first control is specified by the `request` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro controle for especificado o `request` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next>, the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Quando `request` é <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Next>, o comportamento é semelhante ao pressionar a tecla TAB.

trans-unit.source: When `request` is <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous>, the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: Quando `request` é <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection.Previous>, o comportamento é semelhante ao pressionar SHIFT + TAB.

trans-unit.source: Window handle of the hosted window.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de janela da janela hospedada.

trans-unit.source: Message to act upon.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem com relação a qual agir.

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: Informações que podem ser relevantes para tratar a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags.
trans-unit.target: Isso normalmente é usado para armazenar pequenas informações, como sinalizadores.

trans-unit.source: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
trans-unit.target: Informações que podem ser relevantes para tratar a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: This is typically used to reference an object.
trans-unit.target: Isso normalmente é usado para referenciar um objeto.

trans-unit.source: Whether events resulting should be marked handled.
trans-unit.target: Se os eventos resultantes devem ser marcados como tratados.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, accesses the window process of the hosted child window.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, acessa o processo de janela para a janela filho hospedada.

trans-unit.source: The window handle of the child window.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de janela da janela filho.
